meanings.definition: Covered with or having a lot of brush
meanings.sent1: The forest was the brushiest I had ever seen, with bushes everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The jungle was so brushy that it was considered the brushiest area in the region.
meanings.sent3: The brushiest part of the park was where the squirrels loved to hide their acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was like the brushiest thicket, impossible to comb through.
meanings.sent5: The brushiest path through the woods was overgrown and difficult to navigate.

meanings.sent1: The brushiest area of the garden was where the flowers bloomed the brightest.
meanings.sent2: The densest and brushiest part of the forest was home to many different animals.
meanings.sent3: The brushiest section of the field made it challenging for the players to find the lost ball.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was the brushiest of all, with plants growing in every available space.
meanings.sent5: The brushiest corner of the yard was a favorite spot for the rabbits to hide.

meanings.sent1: The brushiest paintbrush in the set was perfect for creating fine details.
meanings.sent2: The artist always chose the brushiest tools to achieve the desired texture in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The brushiest strokes of the brush added depth and dimension to the artwork.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was the brushiest of them all, with intricate patterns and designs.
meanings.sent5: The brushiest strokes of color brought the canvas to life in a vibrant display.
